posts.post_content: my opponent had this and the new juggernaut and was swinging for a lot. With my [Olivia voldaren](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Olivia voldaren) out, i kidnapped it, and ended my turn, transforming it during his upkeep. without this card neither of us would have done as much damage to the other, and it was a lot of fun to play. Definitely wouldn't mind getting a playset of these.
